pub.citation: Harbaugh-Reynaud, D. et al. 2010. A New Lineage-Based Tribal Classification of the Family Caryophyllaceae. International journal of plant sciences 171(2): 185-198.

pmmd.notes: Maximum likelihood (ML) phylogeny from analysis of combined matK, trnL-F, and rps16 sequences. Numbers above the branches represent ML bootstrap (BS) values, while those below are for maximum parsimony (MP) BS values (a missing value represents an MP BS value of <50). Branches with dashed lines collapse in the MP strict consensus tree. Circled letters indicate major clades discussed in the text.
